storyInfo: Lee sleeps deeply, ascending a mountain in his dreams, but very soon a disturbance startles him awake. Invaders in the Liang residence have stolen a wine cup. Everyone splits up to give chase and get it back.

attributes.content: 'The Shangshu Mountains are full of walkways, winding through its steep peaks among the clouds.'
A conspicuous sign stands here. The sign itself is new, and so are the letters written upon it. The words, however, are old.
The mountain is old, and so are the stone steps. The cable cars and the people, however, are all new.
I scratch my head and am surprised to find my hair less of a damp mess than expected. It is as though some indescribable sensation is enlightening my entire body and soul.
All one's vivid daytime memories quickly fade away. Yet, they thoughtfully drift back when needed.
I decide to make my way up.
I am not sure why I do so, but even if these steps took me immediately heavenward, I would still ascend.
As if in response to my sincerity, I find yet another sign around the corner.
A new sign, this time accompanied by new words. It resembles one that advertises scenic spots for tourists.
'Zuanjiang Peak'
Zuanjiang Peak... Is that where I am?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Hello—Anybody home—
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Hello... Anybody home...
attributes.name: Faint Echo

attributes.content: Fine. Now that I'm here, might as well make the best of this.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: (There seems to be a pavilion in the distance.)
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: (Strange... I feels like I've seen this place before...)
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: We don't often get visitors here. Are you heading to the pavilion?
attributes.name: Snowsweeping Stranger

attributes.content: Oh, no... I'm just going to take a peek.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: What is this place...?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Zuanjiang Peak.
attributes.name: Snowsweeping Stranger

attributes.content: One of Shangshu's Three Mounts and Seventeen Peaks?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Eighteen, not Seventeen.
attributes.name: Snowsweeping Stranger

attributes.content: The path to the pavilion isn't an easy one. Someone must have had a lot of free time to build it up there.
attributes.name: Snowsweeping Stranger

attributes.content: Looks like there's somebody up there though...?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Of course. Why else would you build a pavilion?
attributes.name: Snowsweeping Stranger

attributes.content: And you're sweeping snow here?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Correct.
attributes.name: Snowsweeping Stranger

attributes.content: There's nobody here.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: They'll only come after the snow is cleared.
attributes.name: Snowsweeping Stranger

attributes.content: Who will?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Who knows, but you're here now, aren't you?
attributes.name: Snowsweeping Stranger

attributes.content: Isn't the one at the pavilion beckoning you?
attributes.name: Snowsweeping Stranger

attributes.content: Watch your step.
attributes.name: Snowsweeping Stranger

attributes.content: The path is slippery when it's snowy.
attributes.name: Snowsweeping Stranger

attributes.content: Is everyone here?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Correct.
attributes.name: Street Youth

attributes.content: The masters won't let us in on the fun, and the innkeeper is always busy with his customers. The only ones missing are those still sitting around waiting for table scraps.
attributes.name: Street Youth

attributes.content: Are you sure we don't have to listen to I-Innkeeper Zheng...? Can we back out?
attributes.name: Feeble Apprentice

attributes.content: Huh? You still wanna follow him? Might as well quit martial arts and work as one of his cooks!
attributes.name: Street Youth

attributes.content: All the logistics companies have gotta be swimming in dough, with how busy they are. But, no, the old man is so in love with his rules that he'd rather open a restaurant than compete! He must be senile or something!
attributes.name: Street Youth

attributes.content: To Innkeeper Zheng, a restaurant is an upstanding business, while attaching the word 'logistics' to the Xingyu name would merely sully the Association. He'd never accept that.
attributes.name: Feeble Apprentice

attributes.content: And why does he think that?
attributes.name: Street Youth

attributes.content: How would I know?
attributes.name: Feeble Apprentice

attributes.content: We all know old man Zheng's scared of everything these days. After all those years running the Escort Association, only now when he's about to kick the bucket does he realize how many people he's offended for nothing.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: At this rate, the Association is done for, with or without anyone kicking down our doors.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: But this is a huge job from the court, right? You sure it's okay to screw it up on purpose?
attributes.name: Street Youth

attributes.content: This will only work because it's a huge job. I know what I'm doing.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Help! Thief!
attributes.name: Distant Shout

attributes.content: Don't let him get away!
attributes.name: Distant Shout

attributes.content: Uh... is that part of your plan too, Miss Du?
attributes.name: Street Youth

attributes.content: Of course not! Let's go!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: It seems your friend is asleep.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Well, it's getting awfully late...
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: After nothing but small talk?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Then what of the play...?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: We'll discuss this another time. You should rest. Try not to go outside so often.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: You need to take care of yourself.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: I visit because there are matters more pressing to me than my health.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: You mean the plays...?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Mm-hm.
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: I can't leave while I still have duties to attend to.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Is that your way of berating me for idling about all day?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: Of course not.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Help! Thief!
attributes.name: Distant Shout

attributes.content: Hm... A thief?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: How bizarre... A thief at the Liang estate?
attributes.name: Miss Ning

attributes.content: You head on inside. I will take a look.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: What is going on here?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Oh, Mr. Liang. I just arrived myself.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: You two are Lee's guests, and that makes you my guests as well. As your host, I apologize for the disturbance.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: M-Mr. Liang. I was just preparing to leave for the day, when all of a sudden I saw a silhouette up on the wall...
attributes.name: Part-Timer

attributes.content: A silhouette?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Y-Yes, and it looked like it was holding a box...
attributes.name: Part-Timer

attributes.content: To Lee's room! Hurry!
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: The lady sweeping snow was right, it was a difficult climb. And now that I made it, the person I saw is gone.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Hey, are you still here—?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: What is this place anyway...?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.text: The pinnacle of your hike. In other words, the summit.

attributes.content: Why did you summon me here?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.text: You are the one who called me.

attributes.content: I did?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Right...
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: I'm here... to reminisce with you, about the old days.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: I'll pass... There's no suspense to it, much less any enjoyment.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.text: So you only want a drinking buddy, then?

attributes.content: I'm here to give you a small gift.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.text: It's been decades since we last met. Forget the gift; it's the thought that counts.

attributes.content: Only a few decades. Like the snap of a finger.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: A pair, one black and one white, like light and shadow coexisting in harmony.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: Pick one, and I'll keep the other.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: What's the matter? Not to your liking?
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.text: You can fool others, and you can fool our other siblings, but you can't fool me.
Are you not afraid of losing this whole game?

attributes.content: I am, yet also not.
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: Besides, I didn't exactly have a choice—
attributes.name: Lee?

attributes.content: Hm... Was that... all a dream?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Are you okay?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: I'm not so old that you need to worry about me kicking the bucket in my sleep... What's the matter?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Sir, someone just spotted a thief making off with a case that looked just like yours!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Is the case gone?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: You mean the wine cup...? Don't worry. It's right here.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: How did you...?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: The box only contains an ordinary teapot I took from the cupboard, painted black with ink.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I'm not stupid enough to leave it out in the open, knowing someone is after it.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: My good man, you are every bit the cunning genius that Kroos described.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Mr. Liang.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Someone out there is bold enough to provoke the magistrate for an old antique. If every thief were this brazen, the L.G.D. would only need to guard street food stands.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: So isn't it time you told me what this is about?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I will tell you everything you need to know.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Which also coincides with the other matter I need your help with.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Find its owner.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: I see... Some actual detective work this time.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Before that though... Mr. Nothing, where's that benefactor of yours, Kroos?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Uh... D-Did she chase after them?!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: I'll go check on her!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: (I followed them all the way to this night market, but isn't it a bit too lively?)
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: (Did I lose 'em?)
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: (Let me check this direction...)
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Oops, my bad—
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: —You're from this afternoon—
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: I don't suppose you'd believe me if I said I had nothing to do with this?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: I haven't even said anything yet.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: But put yourself in my shoes. Soon as I arrive in Shangshu, I run into someone trying to rob a friend. And now again. Would YOU believe that's a coincidence?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Don't worry though, I'll give you plenty of time to work out your excuse.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Might as well save my breath, then!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: I'll go this way. You check over there.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Right then! I'm counting on you, Brother Lee.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Hold on.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Is something the matter?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: What's that... beside your feet?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Hm? I don't see anything.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Must be my eyes playing tricks... Maybe someone's pet?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Let's go.
attributes.name: Lee
